structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section: No person shall be appointed to any position because of political partisan service rendered by him or his family, or because of political sentiment or affiliation, nor shall any person be dismissed or reduced in grade because of any political opinion.
No employee shall coerce or persuade another, or in any way actively participate in any election, or cause others to do so.

law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 84, effective January 1, 2015. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3235h-6, 3480e-6.
